badges.label: Data Sources Disclosed
badges.description: This chart depicts a compilation of the latest 2100 median warming projections from UNEP, CAT, IEA, and Climate Resource (as of 9 Nov 2021), compared with IPCC AR6 WG1 SSP scenario values

badges.label: Contains Predictions
badges.description: Every bar shows model-based, scenario-dependent future warming estimates rather than observations, signalling that numbers rely on underlying assumptions and may evolve as models or pledges change.

badges.label: Actual Time Offset
badges.description: Compiled on 9 November 2021 from UNEP, CAT, IEA & CR.

badges.label: Multiple Data Sources
badges.description: Estimates compiled from multiple independent groups (UNEP, CAT, IEA, CR).

badges.label: Uncertainty Shown
badges.description: Each bar reports the median (50th-percentile) warming plus a central range printed inside the column. The span reflects variation across integrated-assessment and climate models; wider ranges indicate lower agreement.
